titleStmt.title: An assize sermon preached August 3, 1685, in the Cathedral Church of St. Peter in York before the Right Honourable Sir Edward Atkins and Sir Thomas Walcot, His Majesty's judges of assize for the northern circuit / by William Stainforth ...
titleStmt.author: Stainforth, William, d. 1713.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John White for Richard Lambert ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
